event.title: the government degree college hangu start BS Hons 4 year

data.event: A campus of the Agriculture University was to be build in Hangu City but the project is still pending, as the funds were allegedly transferred to Charsadda by the ANP provincial government .Recently the government degree college hangu start BS Hons 4 year program under Kohat University of Science and Technology.There are two government high schools for boys and two for girls in Hangu.

event.title: centuries, it's possible that travelers, like Hiuen Tsang, saw

data.event: Hangu is also the name of a place in China, and since many Chinese travelers have passed through the area for centuries, it's possible that travelers, like Hiuen Tsang, saw some similarities with their own region and thus named it Hangu.
